page.title: 15BROOKFIELD FARM,CAUNTON
page.content: { MICHAEL'S FARM The Michaels own 140 acres of land. They use 50 acres for corn, 90 acres for grass, 10 acres for oats and 40 acres for barley.They also have 7 cows,1 bull, 41 calves,30 sheep or ewes(sometimes pronounced yows)1 ram, 49 storebeasts,6 horses,1 pony and a dog. Their dog is half sheep dog,half golden labrador.Altogether they own 137 animals.The farmhouse used to be 4 cottages called Fosters Row but now it is just 1 house called Brookfield Farm(named because nearby is a brook in a field). They have three people working fulltime and one person part time. One of their horses is named Star. They own 4 tractors.
